title: Docker
description: Docker is an open-source project that automates the deployment of applications inside software containers, by providing an additional layer of abstraction and automation of operating-system-level virtualization on Linux.

title: aureliaJS
description: Aurelia is a JavaScript client framework for mobile, desktop and web leveraging simple conventions and empowering creativity.

title: ReatJS
description: React is a lightweight framework developed by Facebook that focuses a great deal on performance.
